values.label: Bore
values.comment: A hollowed out section of the item.

values.label: Rim
values.comment: A raised edge or border.

values.label: Web
values.comment: A complete structure or connected series.

values.label: Centre
values.comment: The middle point from any point on the circumference or surface.

values.label: Core
values.comment: The central or most important part of the item.

values.label: Surface
values.comment: The outer most surface of an item.

values.label: Beginning
values.comment: The sample is taken at the beginning of the specimen.

values.label: End
values.comment: The sample is taken at the end of the specimen.

values.label: Middle
values.comment: The sample is taken at the middle of the specimen.

values.label: Centre Back
values.comment: The sample location is centre across width, back end across length.

values.label: Centre front
values.comment: The sample location is centre across width, front end across length.

values.label: Centre middle
values.comment: The sample location is centre across width, middle end across length.

values.label: Edge back
values.comment: The sample location is on the edge across width, back end across length.

values.label: Edge front
values.comment: The sample location is on the edge across width, front end across length.

values.label: Edge middle
values.comment: The sample location is on the edge across the width, middle end across length.

values.label: Quarter back
values.comment: The sample location is a quarter way across the width, back end across length.

values.label: Quarter front
values.comment: The sample location is a quarter way across the width, front end across length.

values.label: Quarter middle
values.comment: The sample location is a quarter way across the width, middle end across length.

values.label: Weld
values.comment: The sample is taken from the weld of the specimen.

values.label: Body
values.comment: Sample is taken from the body of the specimen.
